verses.kjv: Deliver me, O LORD, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man;
verses.ct: Rescue me, LORD, from evil people; protect me from those who are violent.

verses.kjv: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.
verses.ct: They constantly plot wicked schemes in their minds; every day they stir up conflict.

verses.kjv: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; addersâ€™ poison is under their lips. Selah.
verses.ct: Their words cut like a snake's tongue; the venom of vipers hides behind their speech. Selah.

verses.kjv: Keep me, O LORD, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.
verses.ct: Guard me, LORD, from the grip of the wicked; protect me from violent people who plan to trip me up and bring me down.

verses.kjv: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.
verses.ct: The arrogant have hidden traps and ropes for me; they have stretched out a net along my path and set snares to catch me. Selah.

verses.kjv: I said unto the LORD, Thou art my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O LORD.
verses.ct: I said to the LORD, 'You are my God.' Listen to my desperate prayers, LORD.

verses.kjv: O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.
verses.ct: GOD the Lord, my powerful deliverer, you shielded my head on the day of battle.

verses.kjv: Grant not, O LORD, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device; lest they exalt themselves. Selah.
verses.ct: Don't give the wicked what they want, LORD; don't let their evil plans succeed, or they will become proud. Selah.

verses.kjv: As for the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.
verses.ct: As for those who surround me, let the harm caused by their own words come back on their heads.

verses.kjv: Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.
verses.ct: Let burning coals rain down on them; let them be thrown into fire, into deep pits where they can never climb out.

verses.kjv: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him.
verses.ct: Don't let slanderers gain a foothold in the land; let disaster chase down violent people and destroy them.

verses.kjv: I know that the LORD will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.
verses.ct: I know that the LORD will defend the cause of the oppressed and uphold justice for the poor.

verses.kjv: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.
verses.ct: The righteous will certainly praise your name, and those who live with integrity will dwell in your presence.
